quote: This charge I commit unto thee... that thou by them mightest war a good warfare; Holding faith, and a good conscience.
author: 1 Timothy 1:18-19

quote: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.
author: Proverbs 3v5-6

quote: Set your minds on things above, not on earthly things.
author: Colossians 3v2

quote: We love Him, because he first loved us.
author: 1 John 4v19

quote: For we walk by faith, not by sight.
author: 2 Corinthians 5v7

quote: Show yourself in all respects a model of good deeds, and in your teachings show integrity and incorruptibility, and sound speach
author: Titus 2v7-8

quote: I press towards the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
author: Philippians 3v14
